verses.verse: <S%H3548>"Now,<s%> you priests, this commandment is for <S%H4687>you.<s%>

If you will not <S%H8085>listen,<s%> and if you will not <S%H7760>lay<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to my <S%H8034>name,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "then will I <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H3994>curse<s%> on <S%H779>you,<s%> and I will curse your <S%H1293>blessings.<s%> <S%H779>Indeed,<s%> I have cursed them <S%H7760>already,<s%> because you do not lay it to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H1605>Behold,<s%> I will rebuke your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and will <S%H2219>spread<s%> <S%H6569>dung<s%> on your <S%H6440>faces,<s%> even the <S%H6569>dung<s%> of your <S%H2282>feasts;<s%> and you will be taken away with <S%H5375>it.<s%>

You will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> to <S%H1285>you,<s%> that my covenant may be with <S%H3878>Levi,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> was with him of <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to him that he might be <S%H4172>reverent<s%> toward <S%H3372>me;<s%> and he was reverent toward <S%H6440>me,<s%> and stood in <S%H2865>awe<s%> of my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> was in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> was not <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H8193>lips.<s%> He <S%H1980>walked<s%> with me in <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H4334>uprightness,<s%> and <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H8193>lips<s%> should <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and they should <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> at his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for he is the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

But you have <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside out of the <S%H1870>way.<s%> You have caused <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in the <S%H8451>law.<s%> You have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"Therefore I have also <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H959>contemptible<s%> and <S%H8217>base<s%> before all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to the way you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> but have had <S%H5375>respect<s%> for persons in the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

<S%H259>Don't<s%> we all have one <S%H1>father?<s%> <S%H259>Hasn't<s%> one <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H898>us?<s%> Why do we deal treacherously every <S%H376>man<s%> against his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers?<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> has dealt <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>committed<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>holiness<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which he <S%H157>loves,<s%> and has <S%H1166>married<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of a <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H410>god.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H5782>this,<s%> him who wakes and him who <S%H6030>answers,<s%> out of the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and him who <S%H5066>offers<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

This <S%H8145>again<s%> you <S%H6213>do:<s%> you <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and with <S%H603>sighing,<s%> because he <S%H6437>doesn't<s%> regard the <S%H4503>offering<s%> any <S%H3947>more,<s%> neither receives it with good <S%H7522>will<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100><s%> 'Why?' Because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has been <S%H5749>witness<s%> between you and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> against whom you have dealt <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> though she is your <S%H2278>companion,<s%> and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

Did he not <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H259>one,<s%> although he had the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H7307>Spirit?<s%> Why <S%H259>one?<s%> He <S%H1245>sought<s%> a <S%H430>godly<s%> <S%H2233>seed.<s%> Therefore take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and let no one deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

For I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7971>divorce,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "and him who <S%H3680>covers<s%> his <S%H3830>garment<s%> with <S%H2555>violence!<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> "Therefore take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> that you <S%H898>don't<s%> deal treacherously.

You have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with your <S%H1697>words.<s%> Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3021><s%> 'How have we wearied <S%H559>him?<s%>' In that you say, <S%H6213><s%> 'Everyone who does <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H430>them;<s%>' or 'Where is the God of <S%H4941>justice?<s%>'
